original_text: And Isaac was forty years old when he took Rebekah to wife, the daughter of Bethuel the Syrian of Padanaram, the sister to Laban the Syrian.
korean_text: 이삭은 사십 세에 리브가를 맞이하여 아내를 삼았으니 리브가는 밧단 아람의 아람 족속 중 브두엘의 딸이요 아람 족속 중 라반의 누이였더라

sentences.original_text: And Isaac was forty years old
when he took Rebekah to wife
the daughter of Bethuel the Syrian
the sister to Laban the Syrian
